step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in this position.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale and extend. Your right elbow and wrists could be straighter.
Great job on the outward arm movement and relaxing. Keep your wrists straighter as you extend your arms.
You're doing well with the outward movement and relaxing. Aim for straighter wrists and elbows as you extend your arms.
Excellent outward movement and muscle relaxation. Continue to focus on keeping your wrists and elbows straighter during the extension.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the horizontal pumping exercise. Remember to keep your wrists and elbows straighter when extending your arms. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
